mapper.insert: insert into interview_post_reply(ipr_no, ipr_content, ipr_regdate, id, ip_no) values(interview_post_reply_seq.nextval, #{irContents}, sysdate, #{userVO.id}, #{interviewVO.iNo})
mapper.select: select ipr.ipr_no, ipr.ipr_content, ipr.ipr_regdate, ipr.id, ipr.ip_no, u.name from INTERVIEW_POST_REPLY ipr, interview_post ip, users u where ipr.ip_no = ip.ip_no and ipr.id = u.id and ipr.ip_no=#{value}
